ways.name: way through shallow water to the main island
ways.description: The water is shallow enough to wade through.
ways.altDescription: The water is shallow enough to wade through, but a great white shark is swimming here.

items.name: a machete
items.description: big and sharp enough to be used as a weapon
items.where: is stuck in a pile of stones

items.name: a sea shell
items.description: looking so beautiful, it's almost mystic
items.where: is half way buried on the beach

items.name: fish
items.where: are swimming in the shallow water

rooms.name: island
rooms.description:
a tiny island with a small jungle in the middle and beach around it. There are some fish swimming in the eastern ocean.
Unfortunately the great white shark is back in the shallow water between the main island and this little one.
Seems to be his favourite place...

ways.name: path into the jungle
ways.description: The path seems to lead deep into the jungle.
ways.altDescription: The path seems to lead somewhere, but a crocodile is lying on it. It's huge and looks kinda hungry, you can't take that way as long as it lies there.

ways.name: way through shallow water to the tiny island
ways.description: The water is shallow enough to wade through.
ways.altDescription: The water is shallow enough to wade through, but a great white shark is swimming here.

items.name: a parachute
items.description: many meters of intact fabric and ropes
items.where: is lying on the beach. It got washed ashore after you lost it in the ocean

rooms.name: eastern beach
rooms.description:
a flat sandy beach continuing to east with dense jungle in the north and flooted mangroves in the west.
In the south lies a tiny island across the shallow ocean with a shiny, metallic looking object on it.
A great white shark draws its circles there, it doesn't seem like it's going to move away.
There's a path into the jungle, but something big is lying in the shadows there..
rooms.altDescription:
a flat sandy beach continuing to east with dense jungle in the north and flooted mangroves in the west.
In the south lies a tiny island across the shallow ocean. A great white shark draws its circles there,
it doesn't seem like it's going to move away.
There's a path into the jungle, but something big is lying in the shadows there.."

items.name: fish
items.where: are swimming in the shallow water

items.name: a coconut
items.description: eat raw or cook in meal?
items.where: is hanging on a coconut palm

rooms.name: middle beach
rooms.description:
a long, flat sandy beach continuing to east and west with dense jungle and some palms in the north. 
To the south lies the endless sea with large schools of fish in the shallow water

ways.name: sandy trail into the palm forest
ways.description: It's a wind swept trail leading into the palm forest.
ways.altDescription:
It's a wind swept trail leading into the palm forest. It's overgrown with dense thorny bushes,
there's definitely no way through this without getting seriously hurt.

items.name: a fishing rod
items.description: can be used to catch fish

rooms.name: western beach
rooms.description:
a long, flat sandy beach continuing to the east with dense palm forest in the north and high cliffs to the west. 
A small sandy trail seems to lead into the forest, but it's overgrown with thorny bushes. A wide river separates beach and cliffs.
The front half of the broken plane is hanging on the cliffs. It looks almost unharmed, like there could be intact technical devices in there.
The pilot surely owned a mobile two-way radio for emergency reasons..
rooms.altDescription:
a long, flat sandy beach continuing to the east with dense palm forest in the north and high cliffs to the west. 
A small sandy trail seems to lead into the forest, but it's overgrown with thorny bushes. A wide river separates beach and cliffs.
The front half of the broken plane is hanging on the cliffs. It looks almost unharmed, like there could be intact technical devices in there

ways.name: sandy trail
ways.description: a wind swept trail leading to the beach.

ways.name: a trail
ways.description: an animal trail leading towards the wilds.

ways.name: a gravel path
ways.description: at the end of this gravel path you can see the cliffs.

rooms.name: palm forest
rooms.description: A forest of shrubbery and palm trees. Watch out for thorns.

ways.name: cleared path
ways.description: you can see footsteps on this path! There must be other people.

ways.name: a trail
ways.description: an animal trail leading towards the ocean.

ways.name: an animal trail
ways.description: a well worn trail, it must have seen much use.

rooms.name: dense jungle
rooms.description: there's barely any light reaching you through the dense canopy. You can hear animals in the distance.

ways.name: a path
ways.description: it's barely visible, but you can make your way through the trees south.

ways.name: an animal trail
ways.description: a well worn trail, it must have seen much use.

rooms.name: jungle glade
rooms.description: a clearing in the jungle, full of life.

ways.name: a path
ways.description: a wandering path, you can spot human usage.

ways.name: cleared path
ways.description: it's a path that has been hacked through the jungle.

rooms.name: sparse jungle
rooms.description: the trees become smaller and less dense. In the distance you can hear drums.

ways.name: path back to the jungle
ways.description: a wandering path, you can spot human usage

ways.name: entrance to the traders' hut
ways.description: a door that leads to the inside of a hut, which looks like a kind of market

ways.name: entrance to a mysterious looking hut
ways.description: a door which is decorated with bones and skulls and greenish smoke rises from the mysterious black hut

ways.name: entrance to the healers' hut
ways.description: a door into a large hut which seems to belong to the healer

rooms.name: Village Center
rooms.description:
a large place between three huts. In the middle there is a campfire with a large cauldron for cooking.
Spread around the place are some locals who look at you skeptically.

ways.name: exit to the village center
ways.description: a doorway decorated with bones leading back to the village center

rooms.name: Mystic Hut
rooms.description:
a dark hut, lit only by the flickering of a greenish campfire. Bones hang from the ceiling.
A resident of the village drums and sings fanatically. Perhaps it is a ritual?
Around the fire lie various objects: fish bones, a starfish, seaweed and a pile of sand. It seems there is room for one more object..

ways.name: guarded doorway back to the village center
ways.description: next to the door are two residents armed with a spear. So you should not try to steal here

rooms.name: Traders' Hut
rooms.description:
a spacious hut with a trader standing behind a counter.
The entire room is filled with treasures, such as weapons, masks or jewelry

ways.name: exit door to the village center
ways.description: a wide door closed by curtains

ways.name: a secret hatch leading into the cave
ways.description: a hatch is hidden behind a curtain, which leads into a cave

items.name: handwritten recipe
items.description: a handwritten, bloody note containing a recipe for a potion
items.where: on a stool next to the stretcher with the injured person

items.name: empty jar
items.description: an empty jar made of scratched glass
items.where: on a shelf next to many colorful filled jars

rooms.name: Healers' Hut
rooms.description:
a narrow hut with a stretcher in the center.
A wounded man lies on the stretcher. Next to the person is a concerned resident who is treating the wounds.
All around him are shelves with jars containing colored liquids

ways.name: small cave passage
ways.description: It is a small pretty dark passage. The snake is still distracted
ways.altDescription: It is a small, pretty dark passage, guarded by a big and poisonous snake, which I can not fight agains, because it is to strong.

ways.name: a small path
ways.description: It is a small path. In the distance I can see a village.

ways.name: rocky path
ways.description: It is a rocky path along the cliff.

rooms.name: Cave entrance
rooms.description: It is a clearing in front of the cliffs. You can see a dark passage, which seems to lead in a cave.

ways.name: small cave passage
ways.description: It is a small, pretty dark passage, leading outside of the cave.

ways.name: wooden door
ways.description: There is an open door
ways.altDescription: There is a closed door. But it doesn´t look very stable...

ways.name: a small passage
ways.description: Small passage, which leads deeper in the cave. Hopefully it will not break in.

items.name: cairn
items.where: at the edge of the room

rooms.name: cave fork
rooms.description: The cave splits in two ways.

ways.name: wooden door
ways.description: The wooden door is open now.

items.name: mushroom
items.description: A big red mushroom. It seems poisonous.
items.where: at the edge of the room

rooms.name: treasure cave
rooms.description: There are a lot of cobwebs all around. I can barely see anything.
rooms.altDescription: There is a small room with some things on the floor.

ways.name: a small passage
ways.description: Small passage, which leads out of the cave. Hopefully it will not break in.

items.name: bear
items.description: A big bear with the two-way radio.

rooms.name: boss cave
rooms.description: There is a big bear in this room. The bear holds a two-way radio in his hands. I need to fight him to get it.
rooms.altDescription: There is the dead body of the bear on the floor.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: There is a small passage up the hills.

ways.name: sandy path
ways.description: at the end of the sand path you can see the forest.

rooms.name: cliff coast
rooms.description: a small coast on the side of the island with a part of beach and the hills on the side.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: A small passage up the hills. The apes are still distracted.
ways.altDescription: A small passage up the hills. Rocks are thrown in your direction by apes and can hit you. You should to distract them.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: A small passage down the hills.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: A small passage sideway the hills.

rooms.name: cliff wall
rooms.description: A small passage up the hills.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: A small passage down the hills.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: The apes ate all the bananas and are not distracted anymore. They get angry because you tricked them and throw you down the hills into the ocean. The water stream washes you ashore again.

ways.name: rope bridge
ways.description: A rope bridges connect two hills and leads to a small wooden house. The ape king lies on the ground. You can pass easily.
ways.altDescription: A rope bridges connect two hills and leads to a small wooden house. But the way is blocked by a giant ape. This must be the ape king.

rooms.name: ape horde
rooms.description: A small plateau on the hills where the apes are living.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: The door is open so you can get inside.
ways.altDescription: The door is locked. You will need a key to open it.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: At the end of the rope brigde you see the plateau of the apes.

rooms.name: front of a wooden house
rooms.description: You stand in front of the wooden house.

ways.name: a way
ways.description: Leaving the house.

rooms.name: inside of a wooden house
rooms.description: Inside the house you find an old radio transmitter. Some parts need to be fixed, but then it should work.
